testsuite.name: com.sourcepro.Materials.ItemMasterBasicDetailEntry.ItemMasterBasicDetailEntryIndex
testsuite.system-out:
Click on Materials menu.
Click on Item Master Basic Detail - Entry sub menu.
Verify table loaded succesfully.
Table loaded succesfully. ✔ Pass
Click on add new in Item Master Basic Detail - Entry.
Enter Item Code.
Entered value is: KIWIQATlgStirn
Enter Item Description.
Entered value is: Test item's name 123 edit
Enter Item Class.
Selected value is: 100 - Manufacturing Assembly
Enter Item Type.
Selected value is: Manufacturing
Enter Unit Of Measurement.
Selected value is: NOS - Number
Select Linked Items and enter linked item code.
Select Drawing File.
Verify file uploaded succesfully.
File uploaded succesfully. ✔ Pass
Click on Save button.
Verify created item succesfully.
Item created succesfully. ✔ Pass
Edit created item.
Search newly created item.
Click on newly created item.
Enter Updated Item Description.
Entered value is: Edited
Click on Save button.
Verify created item succesfully.
Item updated succesfully. ✔ Pass
Add_Item Master Basic Detail - Entry is passed.
